title: Charmaine Olivia Calcara
content:
[http://charmaineolivia.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123033724/http:/charmaineolivia.com/ "http://charmaineolivia.com/")

One of my favorite artists.. She does both traditional and digital media, and sells handmade prints of her work in her Etsy store! If you look, she does do a good bit of hand lettered type. Her website is simple, yet effective! I'm really loving the recycling of her sketchbook doodles in her layouts and other work too..
author: srquresh
